Translations.Text: kalu evelem teku te'tikum rusulukum bilbeyyinat. kalu bela. kalu fed`u. vema du`au-lkafirine illa fi dalal
inna lenensuru rusulena vellezine amenu fi-lhayati-ddunya veyevme yekumu-l'eshad
yevme la yenfe`u-zzalimine ma`ziratuhum velehumu-lla`netu velehum suu-ddar
velekad ateyna muse-lhuda veevrasna beni israile-lkitab
fasbir inne va`de-llahi hakkuv vestagfir lizembike vesebbih bihamdi rabbike bil`asiyyi vel'ibkar
inne-llezine yucadilune fi ayati-llahi bigayri sultanin etahum in fi sudurihim illa kibrum ma hum bibaligih. feste`iz billah. innehu huve-ssemi`u-lbesir
lehalku-ssemavati vel'ardi ekberu min halki-nnasi velakinne eksera-nnasi la ya`lemun
vema yestevi-l'a`ma velbesiru vellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati vele-lmusi'. kalilem ma tetezekkerun
